author: lukaszlenart

author: gstein
msg: Continued work on the new ra_serf xml parser.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/ra_serf.h:
(svn_ra_serf__xml_closed_t): doc types within ATTRS
(svn_ra_serf__xml_transition_t): note the specific error raised if
an attribute is missing (SVN_ERR_XML_ATTRIB_NOT_FOUND)
(svn_ra_serf__xml_gather_since): doc types within the resulting hash
(svn_ra_serf__xml_note): attributes are char*, so the current type
is fine; no need to question a switch to svn_string_t
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/xml.c:
(svn_ra_serf__define_ns): rename to ...
(define_namespaces): ... this. make static. add a GET_POOL parameter
and switch the pool to BATON. use the callback (if provided) to
get a pool for storing xmlns attributes.
(svn_ra_serf__define_ns): re-introduced as a wrapper around above
(lazy_create_pool): a callback for define_namespaces() to wait until
the pool is needed.
(svn_ra_serf__xml_cb_start): s/NAME/ELEMNAME/. use the new
define_namespaces() to scan for xmlns attributes. collect
attributes if requested.
(svn_ra_serf__xml_cb_end): s/NAME/ELEMNAME/. raise an error if we
aren't looking at the correct tag/element.

author: gstein
msg: Add a little more const love.
This is an API-compatible change since we're adding const, rather than
taking it away. Callers can continue to pass 'const char **'.
* subversion/include/svn_xml.h:
(svn_xml_get_attr_value): add a const to note that we aren't going
to attempt to change the array of attributes.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/xml.c:
(svn_xml_get_attr_value): add const

author: bodewig
msg: verify my understanding of the code
